body_html:
ok, so that could/would mean that the problem is with using anaconda?

also, pip is in the anaconda directory so easy_install doesnt really do anything. it just says, pip is already installed in /Users/act65/anaconda/bin.

should i just start from scratch with by downloading a seperate version of python?

body:
ok, so that could/would mean that the problem is with using anaconda?

also, pip is in the anaconda directory so easy_install doesnt really do anything. it just says, pip is already installed in /Users/act65/anaconda/bin.

should i just start from scratch with by downloading a seperate version of python?
